title: The best early Chain Reaction Cycles Black Friday deals | Big discounts on tyres, winter essentials and more
content:
We’ve poured through Chain Reaction’s early Black Friday deals to bring you the best offers from the online retailer.

Here is our selection of the best cycling offers we’ve found so far.

You can also check out Wiggle’s Black Friday Deals for further savings.

Best Chain Reaction Black Friday Deals

Continental Grand Prix 5000 road tyre £69.95 £49.99 (save 29%)

Continental

The Continental Grand Prix 5000 is one of the best road tyres.

When we reviewed the tyre, we praised its superb ride quality, predictable grip and durability – and it now has 29 per cent off.

  • Buy the Continental Grand Prix 5000 road tyre with a 29 per cent discount

Castelli Alpha ROS 2 Light Jacket £280 £139.99 (save 50%)

Castelli

It’s hard to overstate the popularity of Castelli’s Rain or Shine (ROS) collection. The range of winter jackets keeps plenty of cyclists warm and dry in the cold winter months.

The Alpha ROS 2 Light Jacket is a three-season jacket with a water-resistant exterior and a separate internal vest, enabling you to control insulation and ventilation.

  • Buy the Castelli Alpha ROS 2 Light Jacket with a 50 per cent discount

LifeLine Bike Tool Kit £49.99 £24.99 (save 50%)

LifeLine

This LifeLine tool kit consists of 18 pieces, providing you with all you need for any essential bike maintenance tasks.

The kit is complete with a hard box and foam liner, and currently has 50 per cent off.

  • But the LifeLine Bike Tool Kit with a 50 per cent discount

Vittoria Corsa Control G2.0 road tyre £69.99 £44.99 (save 36%)

Vittoria

The Vittoria Corsa Control G2.0 has a thicker tread for greater puncture resistance, with Vittoria claiming it has optimised rolling performance, grip and traction.

Oh, and Chain Reaction says it claimed victory on the 2018 Strade Bianche – although we’re pretty sure it was Tiesj Benoot pushing the pedals and not the tyre.

  • Buy the Vittoria Corsa Control G2.0 with a 36 per cent discount

Vitus Vitesse EVO Rival AXS £3,499.99 £2,279.99 (save 35%)

Dave Caudery / Our Media

The Vitus Vitesse EVO Rival AXS scored no fewer than 4.5 stars when Warren Rossiter reviewed it last year. He praised its fantastic handling and superb value.

It’s now even better value with 35 per cent off.

  • Buy the Vitus Vitesse EVO Rival AXS with a 35 per cent discount

Troy Lee Designs D4 Composite helmet £400 £219.99 (save 45%)

Troy Lee Designs

Troy Lee Designs is renowned for making some of the best mountain bike helmets and the D4 is no exception.

This composite version is slightly heavier than its carbon counterpart, but with 45 per cent off, we’d take the weight penalty.

  • Buy the TLD D4 Composite helmet with a 45 per cent discount

POC Tectal Race SPIN Helmet £200 £69.99 (save 65%)

POC

The POC Tectal Race SPIN Helmet is an open-face mountain bike helmet, but it extends further down the neck for greater coverage.

The helmet uses POC’s own equivalent of MIPS to protect you from multi-directional impacts and minimises force being transferred to your head in a crash.

  • Buy the POC Tectal Race SPIN Helmet with a 65 per cent discount

Nukeproof Blackline Men’s Trail Pants £85 £45 (save 47%)

Nukeproof

The Nukeproof Blackline Men’s Trail Pants are suitable for use all year round and have a durable water-repellent coating to keep you dry when cycling in the rain.

  • Buy the Nukeproof Blackline Men’s Trail Pants with a 47 per cent discount

Oakley Eyewear Jawbreaker sunglasses £280 £159.99 (save 43%)

Oakley

By now, the Oakley Jawbreakers should be considered a classic, having disappeared from the pro peloton but remaining synonymous with the likes of Mark Cavendish.

The cycling sunglasses are also a staple of cycling retailer sales and they currently have 43 per cent off.

  • Buy the Oakley Eyewear Jawbreaker sunglasses with a 43 per cent discount

dhb Extreme Winter Gloves £45 £27 (save 40%)

dhb

The dhb Extreme Winter Gloves pair hollow-fill insulation and a fleece lining with a waterproof and windproof exterior to keep your hands warm and dry in the coldest winter months.

At full price, these gloves are a bargain compared to many of the best winter gloves and they’re now 40 per cent cheaper.

  • Buy the dhb Extreme Winter Gloves with a 40 per cent discount

LifeLine Essential Torque Wrench Set £39.99 £22.99 (save 43%)

LifeLine

It’s tempting to tighten bolts up without a torque wrench, but this can lead to damaging parts on your bike.

To save yourself any embarrassing trips to the bike shop, grab this LifeLine Essential Torque Wrench set with 43 per cent off.

  • Buy the LifeLine Essential Torque Wrench Set with a 43 per cent discount

dhb Women’s Merino long-sleeve baselayer £50 29.99 (save 40%)

dhb

This women’s baselayer uses Merino wool to keep you warm. With 40 per cent off, it’s a steal.

  • Buy the dhb Women’s long-sleeve baselayer with a 40 per cent discount

Brand-X Ascend Dropper Seatpost – £139.99 £99.99 (save 29%)

Chain Reaction Cycles

A dropper post is one of the best mountain bike upgrades you can make, enabling you to get the saddle out of the way on technical descents.

Brand-X is one of Wiggle CRC’s in-house component brands and the Ascend is its first-generation offering. We highly rate the Ascend II, which replaces this post.

Your frame will need to have internal routing to run this dropper post and it’s currently available in 100, 125 and 150mm-travel options, in both a 30.9 and 31.6mm seatpost diameter.

The post even comes with a lever that’s suitable for mountain bike handlebars with a 22.2mm diameter.

  • Buy the Brand-X Ascend Dropper Seatpost with 29 per cent discount from Chain Reaction 

Prime Primavera Aero Carbon Road Handlebar – £159.99 £119.99 (save 25%)

Prime

A carbon handlebar is an underrated upgrade for your road bike, further damping vibrations that transmit to your hands over an aluminium alternative.

This aero handlebar is constructed from high-modulus carbon fibre and Prime claims it weighs 228g in its 42cm guise. The tops have an aero profile to cheat the wind and sport a relatively short 76.5mm reach, combined with a 122mm drop.

The handlebar is available in widths from 36 to 44cm and features internal routing, as well as Shimano Di2 compatibility.

  • Buy the Prime Primavera Aero Carbon Road Handlebar with a 25 per cent discount from Chain Reaction 

Nukeproof Horizon Carbon Riser Bar – £99.99 £49.99 (save 50%)

Chain Reaction Cycles

Chain Reaction also has a carbon mountain bike handlebar equivalent for shredders.

Nukeproof’s Horizon Carbon Riser Bar has been designed to be both lightweight and comfortable, thanks to the inclusion of a glass-fibre layer for additional damping and reinforcement.

The bar is available in 800mm widths, in 12, 25 and 38mm-rise options. If that’s too wide for you, remember you can always cut a handlebar down to size.

Nukeproof is so confident in this bar that it backs it with a lifetime warranty.

  • Buy the Nukeproof Horizon Carbon Riser Bar with a 50 per cent discount from Chain Reaction 

Nukeproof Neutron EVO Flat Pedals – £34.99 From £16.99 (save 51%)

Ian Linton / Our Media

Nukeproof’s latest Neutron EVO flat pedals got new pedal pin placements in 2022 for improved grip.

The body is nylon-reinforced composite and they spin on a chromoly steel axle.

The pedal is available in 15 colours, so there’s sure to be an option to match your bike.

Senior technical editor Alex Evans found the pedals to be a cost-effective way of accessing reasonably good levels of grip in his 3.5-star review.

  • Buy the Nukeproof Neutron EVO Flat Pedals with a 51 per cent discount from Chain Reaction
author: BikeRadar
